meanings.definition: The act of beheading or cutting off the head.
meanings.sent1: The decollation of the criminal was a common punishment in ancient times.
meanings.sent2: The decollation of the chicken was done swiftly by the butcher.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a fake decollation that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the decollation of the opponent's queen can change the course of the match.
meanings.sent5: The decollation of the statue's head left it incomplete and damaged.
